name: PrimalMyst Gear System
description: Core framework for the three-tier gear system in PrimalMyst

gear_system.equipment_philosophy: Balanced progression with specialized enhancement options across three distinct gear categories

weapons.description: Combat-focused equipment for dealing damage and enabling special abilities

main_hand.restrictions: One primary weapon at a time
main_hand.two_handed_consideration: Two-handed weapons occupy the main weapon slot but may have enhanced effects

weapons.placeholder_notes: Weapon system will be implemented in future updates with full combat mechanics

jewelry.description: Mystical accessories providing passive bonuses, resistances, and unique effects

belt_lock.description: Special attachment point on the belt for utility items, charms, or mystical focuses

jewelry_philosophy.design_principle: Jewelry provides specialized mystical enhancements that complement core abilities without overshadowing them
jewelry_philosophy.balance_consideration: Six jewelry slots allow for diverse customization while maintaining clear identity
jewelry_philosophy.thematic_integration: Each jewelry type serves different mystical functions aligned with PrimalMyst's divine and hexagonal themes

armor.description: Protective equipment providing defense, resistances, and utility features

gloves.design_note: Gloves and gauntlets are treated as a single armor piece

belt.special_feature: Belt provides the attachment point for the belt_lock jewelry slot

boots.design_note: Boots are treated as a single armor piece covering both feet

armor_philosophy.design_principle: Six armor pieces provide comprehensive protection while allowing for diverse aesthetic and functional choices
armor_philosophy.balance_consideration: Each armor slot serves distinct protective and enhancement roles
armor_philosophy.thematic_integration: Armor reflects the wearer's cultural background, divine alignment, and personal style preferences

slot_summary.note: 13 total slots (1 weapon + 6 jewelry + 6 armor) provide extensive customization while maintaining clear equipment identity

divine_influences.description: All gear can be influenced by divine energies from the six primary gods
divine_influences.application: Gear gains thematic bonuses and effects based on divine alignment
divine_influences.flexibility: Players can seek gear aligned with their preferred divine traditions

hexagonal_resonance.description: Gear can resonate with hexagonal positioning and cosmic patterns
hexagonal_resonance.application: Equipment bonuses that complement hexagonal positioning benefits
hexagonal_resonance.integration: Gear effects harmonize with divine trial positioning without direct dependency

rank_progression.description: Gear follows the E-D-C-B-A-S-SS rank system
rank_progression.application: Higher rank gear provides more powerful effects and greater customization
rank_progression.balance: Ensures meaningful progression throughout the entire level range

set_bonuses.description: Related gear pieces can provide set bonuses when worn together
set_bonuses.application: Wearing multiple pieces from the same thematic set grants additional benefits
set_bonuses.flexibility: Set bonuses complement but don't restrict individual gear choices

design_principles.choice_variety: Extensive customization options through 12 total equipment slots
design_principles.thematic_coherence: All gear reflects PrimalMyst's divine, hexagonal, and mystical themes
design_principles.balance_maintenance: No single gear piece should dominate character power
design_principles.progression_clarity: Clear upgrade paths through rank and level progression
design_principles.aesthetic_freedom: Wide variety of visual styles to match player preferences
design_principles.mechanical_depth: Complex interactions between gear, abilities, and positioning systems

implementation_notes.weapon_system: Placeholder implementation - will be expanded with full combat mechanics
implementation_notes.jewelry_system: Ready for immediate implementation with example items
implementation_notes.armor_system: Ready for immediate implementation with full protection mechanics
